availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Donan (Munfordville, Kentucky, attorney and politician)

body.p: Munfordville, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Henrietta Donan. Attorney in Munfordville in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives in the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Hart County from 1857 to 1861. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 2, p. 6. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Munfordville, p. 4. Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1878), p. 332. KYR-0001-004-1071.
